message: I want to order a margherita pizza

Assistant: To place an order for the Margherita pizza, I'll need some information from you. First, may I have your NYU ID, please? It should be an 8-digit number. If you don't remember it, we can look up your account using other details.

Once you provide that, I'll also need to know the building where you are located on campus (either A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, or A6C).

After that, I'll ask for your UAE mobile number so we can contact you when the order is ready. Finally, I'll ask if you have any special requests for your order, such as extra toppings or dietary restrictions.

Once I have all this information, I can place your order for you. Let's start with your NYU ID, please.
My NYU ID is 12345678, my building number is 213456 and my number is 123454331

Great! I found the Margherita pizza on our menu for AED 31.0. Would you like to place an order for this item? Please respond with 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel.

User: yes

I'm sorry for the confusion. Let me clarify your NYU ID. It should be an 8-digit number. If you don't remember it, we can look up your account using other details. Could you please provide me with your correct NYU ID?

Also, could you let me know the building where you are located on campus (either A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, or A6C)?

Once you provide these details, I'll ask for your UAE mobile number so we can contact you when the order is ready. Finally, I'll ask if you have any special requests for your order, such as extra toppings or dietary restrictions.
